text: Tshiabola Mapanya (born June 7, 1983) is a retired Congolese football defender. == Career == Mapanya played for SC Cilu,1.FK PŘÍBRAM - Tshiabola Mapanya before signed for FK Jablonec in July 2008.Tshiabola Mapanya - FK BAUMIT Jablonec After only four months he left FK Baumit Jablonec and signed with League rival 1. FK Příbram.Tshiabola Mapanya Příbram - Fotbal iDNES.cz He played in the 2008/2009 season six games played for 1. FK Příbram in the Czech League.Congo - T. Mapanya - de.soccerway.com/ He left in May 2010 the Czech Republic and signed with French Championnat de France amateur 2 club St Marcel Foot.Mapanya Tshiabola joueur de Saint Marcel Football ==Notes== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo international footballers Category:SC Cilu players Category:FK Jablonec players Category:1. title: Tshiabola Mapanya
